data.text:
Mary Pickford (1892 - 1979)

a.k.a. Dorothy/Gladys Nicholson, or Baby Gladys Smith (as a child stage actress)

Film Deaths:[]

Madame Butterfly (1915) [Cho-Cho San]: Drowns in the river at the end of the movie. (See also Anna May Wong, Lil Dagover and Sylvia Sidney for other versions).

Stella Maris (1918) [Stella Maris/Unity Blake]: Playing a dual role, "Unity" commits suicide (off-screen) by shooting herself, after she shoots Marcia Manon. We learn of her death afterwards when the police inform Conway Tearle. ("Stella" survives the movie.)

TV Deaths:[]

None.

Notable Connections:[]
